Partly cloudy skies PERIOD Low 44F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



The Software Development Group part of ECUs Information Technology and Computing Sciences ITCS is replacing the old student desktop with the ECU OneStop PERIOD

 said Don Sweet of ITCS PERIOD

According to Sweet the ECU OneStop will eventually phase out the student desktop PERIOD

 Sweet said PERIOD

According to Sweet the purpose of the new desktop will be to give students one place to go on the web for everything PERIOD

 Sweet said PERIOD 

Sweet said a director came down from the UNC system to implement a student portal concept PERIOD

 Sweet said PERIOD

According to Sweet the portal concept is the new wave of the Internet PERIOD

 Sweet said PERIOD

Junior Temia Smith said that she likes the fact that she can use her email user id and pin to access the OneStop PERIOD

 said Smith PERIOD

Sweet said that letting students use their email password is one of the biggest advantages of the new OneStop PERIOD

Senior Tanoa Mardis agreed PERIOD

 said Mardis PERIOD

Mardis said that once students orient themselves with the new ECU OneStop they will find it easier to use than the last one PERIOD

Senior Althea Sprosta agreed PERIOD

 said Sprosta PERIOD 

Senior Yusef Ewais disagreed and complained about the system being down yesterday PERIOD

 said Ewais PERIOD It is just a big headache Ewais said PERIOD

This writer can be contacted at newstheeastcarolinian.com PERIOD
